First, Kevin Kramer and Sam Crockett explore their pent-up physical attraction for each other on graduation day when Sam announces that he's joined the Navy to see the world. On the ship, naval officer Peter Bishop snags sailors Paul Morgan and Dirk Adams away from their regular duties to take turns drilling his insatiable port hole instead. Then, Sam tops Jason Nikas in the latrines for not squealing on him about an incriminating letter from Kevin. Finally, Eric Evans violates Brett Williams for the violation of swabbing the deck of a "special duty" area!
title: Below the Decks
